description:
The Millefiore`s troops appear to have successfully broken into the Vongola hideout. But a giant trap is waiting for them along with Hibari, who is waiting with Tonfa surrounded with deathperation flames. Thinking that he cannot take on all those people by himself, Tsuna tries to help him. But Reborn stops him and tells him that if he wants to repay Hibari for his actions, then he has to make their raid a success. They hurry to the enemy`s hideout and trust in Hibari`s strength…
Source: crunchyroll
